sections.title: Verse 1
content: Virgin full of grace, purest of our race,
Maiden of gladness, banish our sadness:
Pray for us, O pray for us, O Mary!

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Mary, plead for us, intercede for us,
You are the portal to life immortal:
Pray for us, O pray for us, O Mary!

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Queen of saints above, wondrous in your love,
Rise to shield us, O Mary!
Show us, O Mother, Jesus, our Brother:
Pray for us, O pray for us, O Mary!

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Star of ocean bright, splendor in the night,
Help, we implore you, all here before you:
Pray for us, O pray for us, O Mary!
